sentences.sContent: This provided a pretext for the authorities to cancel the elections.
sentences.sCn: 这给当局提供了一个取消选举的借口。

sentences.sContent: ...the relevant authorities should set up favorable regulations to encourage invention...

remMethod.val: author(作家) ＋ ity → 作家是写作领域的权威 → 权威

trans.tranOther: Theauthorities are the people who have the power to make decisions and to make sure that laws are obeyed
